text: Dominique Lecourt (; 5 February 1944 – 1 May 2022) was a French philosopher. He was known for his work creating an interpretation of the philosophy of science of Gaston Bachelard. He was honored with the National Order of the Legion of Honour. He was a professor at the Université Paris Diderot-Paris 7. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French philosophers Category:French academics Category:Writers from Paris
title: Dominique Lecourt
